Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長
Entry.EnglishText: Manager

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ
Entry.EnglishText: Selena

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: 雑貨屋「準備万端」
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 雑貨屋
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰もいないな。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no one here.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり……静か過ぎる……
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed, it's too quiet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 見て、コレ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, look!

Entry.JapaneseText: やはり<Blue>王の盾<White>か!?
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>!?

Entry.JapaneseText: あっちだよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's coming from over there!

Entry.JapaneseText: や、やったぞ……！
Entry.EnglishText: W-We did it!

Entry.JapaneseText: やりましたね、工場長！
Entry.EnglishText: We put up quite a fight, didn't we Boss?

Entry.JapaneseText: だ、だが…… 倒しても倒してもわいて来る…… もうダメかもしれん……
Entry.EnglishText: But it seems like no matter how many we defeat, more and more keep coming. This might not end well for us...

Entry.JapaneseText: 力を合わせれば、 バイラスだって倒せるんだから、 がんばりましょうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: These Biruses don't stand a chance as long as we work together! We can do this!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうですよ、工場長！ あきらめちゃダメです！
Entry.EnglishText: He's right, Boss! There's no need to give up!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ああ、がんばるさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yeah, okay... I'll try hanging in there...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… あなたもがんばるのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>... I hope you're hanging in there, too.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナさんをかばって、 なんか一騒動あったみたいだが……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess there was a huge disturbance because he tried to protect Selena...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まったく、最近、 世間は物騒な話ばっかだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Geez... There's been a lot of awful things happening these days...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>はまだ生きてるって！ こいつら、勝手に殺しやがって……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s still alive! Those guys just left him for dead...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたら…… 助けに行ってくれるんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: You guys are going to save him, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>はとてもいい奴だったよ…… 人を分け隔てしなかったし……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> was a good kid... He treated everyone fairly...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… 俺たちはおまえの事を 忘れないぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>... We won't ever forget you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は とても気のいい奴なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s a good kid.

Entry.JapaneseText: それが…… どうしたっていうんだ、 <Tytree>のやつ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...But just what is happening to him...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、<Tytree>……!! ぶたないで……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Eep, <Tytree>...!! Don't hit me...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は南の方から逃げてきたの。 ヒューマの人に追い出されて……
Entry.EnglishText: I fled here from the south. The Huma there chased us out of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ……!! コワイよ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm afraid of Huma!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様まで 処刑しようとしたなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that they tried to execute the Queen...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱりヒューマって 残酷なんでしょ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Huma sure are cruel, aren't they...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒュー……！ ヒューマ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: H-Huma—!

Entry.JapaneseText: ほんの少しだけセレーナお姉ちゃんみたいに 優しいヒューマもいるけど、 やっぱり私はヒューマは好きになれないの……
Entry.EnglishText: There are nice Huma like Ms. Selena, but I don't think I'm ever going to like them all...

Entry.JapaneseText: だって…… コワイんだもん……
Entry.EnglishText: Because... I'm scared of them...

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃっ……!! ヒューマっ！
Entry.EnglishText: A-Ahhh!! A Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: このあいだ、 来たヒューマのお姉ちゃんは とても優しかった……
Entry.EnglishText: An older Huma girl was here earlier. She was very kind...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマにも ああいう人がいるのね……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess there are kind Huma as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: え、えっと…… あ、あの……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, uhm... Uhh...

Entry.JapaneseText: おじちゃんは とても強そうだね。
Entry.EnglishText: Y-You look p-pretty strong, Mister.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマも 怖くないんでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: I guess you're not afraid of Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ……!! イヤだよー！ どっか行って……!!
Entry.EnglishText: A-A H-Huma—! N-No—! Go away...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: コワイ!! 助けて!!？
Entry.EnglishText: S-Someone, save me!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマって 怖い人ばっかじゃないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Not all Huma are scary...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……ヒューマの人と 話す時は体がこわばっちゃうの……
Entry.EnglishText: But... I freeze up wh-whenever I have to talk to one...

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、こんにちは……私…… …………
Entry.EnglishText: H-Hello... I'm...

Entry.JapaneseText: おじちゃん、 ヒューマと一緒にいて、 大丈夫なの？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right being together with Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、ヒューマは……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm...not...

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、<Tytree>！ きょうも精が出るな！
Entry.EnglishText: Hello, <Tytree>! Let's both do our best today, too!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもを ビシビシ監督してこいよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Make sure to keep a good eye on those Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい！ 今日はどんな御用だい？
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome! What can I do for you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 買い物をする 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だ、もう帰るのかい？ 何か買っていきなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you're leaving? Come on, don't be shy! Buy something!

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々置いてあるから、 見てっておくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have all kinds of stuff here, come and take a look!

Entry.JapaneseText: またな。
Entry.EnglishText: See ya!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか工場の方で大騒ぎになってる みたいだけど商売もあるし、 抜けられないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's some sort of commotion going on at the factory, but I can't leave my shop.

Entry.JapaneseText: 見てきたら、 何があったか教えてくれよっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Let me know if you find out what's going on!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の身に 何かがあったそうだな……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that something happened to <Tytree>...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたちの しわざかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Were you the ones behind it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… 気の毒にな……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>... You look like a wreck.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……元気だせよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Cheer up, kid.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナが誘拐された みたいだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like Selena was kidnapped.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、何が目的なんだ？ 金か？
Entry.EnglishText: Why would they do such a thing? Are they holding her for ransom?

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナが 助かったって？
Entry.EnglishText: You saved Selena?

Entry.JapaneseText: そりゃよかった…… セレーナはまだ バビログラードなんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: But she's still in Babilograd, huh? Well, thank goodness, she's safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: いやね、 一時はどうなるかと 思ったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I was wondering about what would happen to her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何せこの街は 事件らしい事件も ないからね。
Entry.EnglishText: After all, nothing like that has ever happened here before.

Entry.JapaneseText: いやあ、セレーナが助かって、 よかった、よかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Ahhh... I'm glad Selena's finally safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら顔なじみの<Tytree>でも うちの商品は安くできないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Just because you're friends with <Tytree>, doesn't mean I'm gonna give you a discount.

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちも生活が かかってるんだからよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've got to make money, after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつも<Tytree>が 世話になってるな。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks for always looking out for <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ 俺？ <Tytree>の従兄弟の嫁の 弟の友人さ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hm? Who am I? Why, I'm <Tytree>'s cousin's wife's little brother's friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……実際は まったくの他人って事 だけどな。
Entry.EnglishText: Which I guess means I'm not related to him at all.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、なんかガジュマが増えてさ…… 連中はみんな工場で働いてるから、 別にどうという事はないが……
Entry.EnglishText: Seems like there's been more Gajuma around lately... Well, they're all working at the factory, so it's no big deal...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場の連中は色々と 大変みたいだぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: There's been trouble brewing at the factory lately.

Entry.JapaneseText: もともとこの街は ガジュマが少ない街なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There weren't many Gajuma who lived here before.

Entry.JapaneseText: それがなんでも他の街を 追い出されたとかで、 ガジュマが増えてな……
Entry.EnglishText: But now because they're all getting kicked out of other towns, we've gotten an influx of them here...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、精が出るな！
Entry.EnglishText: Good work out there, <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつ帰ってくるんだ？ セレーナも心配してるぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: When're ya gonna come back? Selena's worried sick about you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは工場の街だからな、 俺みたいな商売人は 少し肩身が狭いのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Being a merchant in a town full of factories makes me feel a little insignificant.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう意味では、 工場に来たガジュマも 同じかもしれないな……
Entry.EnglishText: So I suppose the Gajuma that moved here might feel the same way...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場の奴が言ってたが、 新入りのガジュマが 不満を抱いてるんだと。
Entry.EnglishText: Someone at the factory told me that the new Gajuma hires are unhappy.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく……新しく来たくせに 生意気な事を言う連中だ……
Entry.EnglishText: They've gotta lotta nerve thinking they can be so conceited when they've just arrived.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア中に種族間のいがみ合いが 広がってるみたいだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like the interracial conflict is spreading throughout Callegea.

Entry.JapaneseText: まさかこの街でも そんな事になるとは 思わなかったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I never thought that we'd be having problems like that here too.

Entry.JapaneseText: いやね、工場で働く ガジュマの不安が 溜まってるみたいでね。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that the Gajuma working at the factory have been growing more restless...

Entry.JapaneseText: 風のようにやって来て、 風のように去っていったあの娘……
Entry.EnglishText: Like a passing breeze, she came and left in the blink of an eye.

Entry.JapaneseText: 北の方へ向かったけど…… 今はどこにいるのやら……
Entry.EnglishText: It seemed like she was heading north... I wonder where she is now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いつも夕方になると 家に向かう工員の姿を 見るんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I often see factory workers passing by on their way home in the evening...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、みんな浮かない顔 してるんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Lately, they all seem to be miserable...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの地鳴り以来、 空気がなんとなく 変わった気がするんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I feel like things have changed ever since that earthquake.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、うまくは 言えないんだけどさ、 不穏な空気が広がってるっていうか……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't really put it into words, but it feels like things have gotten even more restless...

Entry.JapaneseText: でもとりあえず、 この街は無事にやってるぜ。 なんとかな。
Entry.EnglishText: We seem to be safe here, at least...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレも昔は工場で働いてたのさ。 でも、腰を痛めちまってね。 こうして商売をしてるのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I used to work at the factory until I hurt my back. Now I'm just a merchant.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、 気をつけろ！
Entry.EnglishText: You take care of yourself. All right, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもは街の外に 逃げた連中を追いかけていったが、 まだ街の中に残ってるかもしれんぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma chased after those who tried to escape town, but she might not have left!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ミナールへ行ったかい？ いやなにね、どうにも治安が悪くて 大変らしいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Have you been to Minal, lately? I heard it's become more dangerous there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール経由の品物が 届かなくなったら、 困っちまうぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's gonna be really troublesome for me if my goods fail to get through there.

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだ、 この地鳴りは!?
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-Whoa!? It's an earthquake!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい！ 今日はどんな御用だい？
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome! What can I do for you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 買い物をする 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だ、もう帰るのかい？ 何か買っていきなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you're leaving? Come on, don't be shy! Buy something!

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々置いてあるから、 見てっておくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have all kinds of stuff here, come and take a look!

Entry.JapaneseText: またな。
Entry.EnglishText: See ya!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
